attributes.action: keep the grass in Trafalgar Square.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The laying of turf in Trafalgar Square in May 2007 was a remarkable improvement to the usual grey urban City, for visitors and workers alike. It was a fantastic experiment but shockingly brief. We the undersigned demand the government make Central London greener and bring back our village green!
